footer.text: Character Guide â€¢ Constellations: Dendro Traveler

fields.name: Parasitic Creeper (C1)
fields.value: After Razorgrass Blade hits an opponent, it will regenerate 3.5 energy for the Traveler.

fields.name: Green Resilience (C2)
fields.value: Lea Lotus Lamp's duration is increased by 3 seconds.

fields.name: Whirling Weeds (C3)
fields.value: Increases the Level of Razorgrass Blade by 3.

fields.name: Treacle Grass (C4)
fields.value: After the Lea Lotus Lamp triggers a Lotuslight Transfiguration, it will obtain 5 stacks of Overflowing Lotuslight effect from the Passive Talent 'Verdant Overgrowth'. You must have unlocked this Passive Talent first.

fields.name: Viridian Transience (C5)
fields.value: Increases the Level of Surgent Manifestation by 3.

fields.name: Withering Aggregation (C6)
fields.value: The Dendro DMG Bonus of the character under the effect of Overflowing Lotuslight as created by the Lea Lotus Lamp is increased by 12%. If the Lamp has experienced a Lotuslight Transfiguration previously, the character will also gain 12% DMG Bonus for the corresponding element.
